tool_description: Manages vendor qualification and creates targeted distribution lists based on procurement requirements.

industry_codes.description: Industry classification codes for vendor selection

minimum_experience_years.description: Minimum years of relevant experience required

error_messages: Invalid industry codes: Provide valid industry classification codes.
Invalid experience requirement: Experience years must be a non-negative integer.
Geographic restriction format error: Provide valid geographic identifiers.
Certification format error: Provide valid certification names or codes.
usage: Specify industry codes and minimum experience requirements. Optionally add geographic restrictions, certifications, and small business preferences. Returns qualified vendor list with contact information.

vendor_list.description: List of qualified vendor names and contact information

selection_summary.description: Summary of selection criteria and results
